english_example_sentence: If we seem happy, our family also becomes happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если мы будем выглядеть счастливыми, наша семья тоже будет счастлива.
turkish_example_sentence: Biz mutlu görünsek, ailemiz de mutlu olur.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz mutlu ______, ailemiz de mutlu olur.
